translation: Now, O Supreme Lord, as Thou hast thus described Thyself, O Supreme Person, I wish to behold Thy divine form.
commentary: 11.3 Evam thus? This this? such as as? Ath hast declared? You Thou? Thyself? God O Supreme Lord? to see to see? I want (I) desire? And Thy? form form? God sovereign? Purushottama O Supreme Purusha.Commentary Some commentators take the two halves of this verse as two independent sentences and interpret it thusSo it is? Or Supreme Lord? as Thou hast declared Thyself to be. (But still)
